thread.title: Aust dollar rallies on ECB news
thread.title_full: Aust dollar rallies on ECB news | Business Spectator

author: AAP
title: Aust dollar rallies on ECB news
text:
The Australian dollar has pushed higher after the European Central Bank hinted that near-term monetary policy easing and economic stimulus was imminent.
At 12pm (AEDT) on Friday, the currency was trading at US72.27c, up from US71.96c on Thursday.
ANZ economists said commodity currencies typically outperformed overnight, with the prospect of additional liquidity from the ECB supporting risk appetite.
Meanwhile, National Australia Bank has become the third of the big four lenders to hike its standard variable home loan interest rate, pushing it up by 0.17 percentage points to 5.6 per cent.
